title: Slaughter at The River (for 2001)
desc: Huge NPA forces are advancing further into Rabbit territory. Sergeant Cadbury encamped his army on an abandoned mining site, however Commander Fathead has already reached them from the south. Cadbury won't be able to withstand their attacks for very long. Your objective is to rush across the river and reinforce the defense. Apparently Colonel Fat Claw is coming, to conquer the mining site himself.
author: YetiWizard

title: S.W.I.N.E. Classic remaster
desc: What if you DIY HD Remaster?
author: bads.tm

title: S.W.I.N.E. Hungarian install CD
desc: A S.W.I.N.E. telepítéséhez szükséges első - második  CD!/The S.W.I.N.E. required to install the first and second CD!
author: Stormregion (file from swine-klub2001.ucoz.hu)

title: S.W.I.N.E. 3.0
desc: Csak magyar nyelvű játékkal működik, viszont a telepítő állításával ellentétben nem muszáj a S.W.I.N.E.-nak a C:\Program Files-ban lennie.
author: Nice

title: S.W.I.N.E. 2.3 HD
desc: Patched up S.W.I.N.E. plus multiplayer balance updates and networking fixes
author: Digi

title: S.W.I.N.E. 2.2 (old)
desc: Patched up S.W.I.N.E. plus multiplayer balance updates and networking fixes
author: Digi

title: S.W.I.N.E. 2.1
desc: In the multiplayer, the images of the day have been replaced with the images of the 2007 S.W.I.N.E. meeting and all objects can be shot.
author: Acél,Gregov [WARNING: Game EXE is Potentially virus infected!]

title: S.W.I.N.E. 2.0 (old)
desc: Version 2.0 is faster than 1.9 in every way. The most noticeable change is that tanks move faster. Units can react up to 2 times faster (compared to 1.9), so the game experience can be as if you were playing in single-player mode. Another advantage is that it can be installed twice as fast.
author: Digi

title: S.W.I.N.E. 1.9
desc: The last exe created by Stormregion, there is also a foreign language version of it, but it does not have fraud protection.
author: Stormregion

title: S.W.I.N.E. 1.8
desc: Version with anti-cheat protection, double armor and turbo can be placed on the units, you can also buy atoms during the game. It only works with the Hungarian version!
author: Acél,Gregov

title: S.W.I.N.E. 1.7
desc: - you can buy a heavy tank for rabbits, a tank hunter for pigs - trailers have become more expensive and "durable". - all equipment can be purchased for each unit        - the units have a longer firing and sight range - in multiplayer mode, money amounts increased by 50 sp
author: Acél,Gregov

title: S.W.I.N.E. 1.6
desc: Version working only with Hungarian S.W.I.N.E., with fraud protection.
author: Acél,Gregov

title: S.W.I.N.E. 1.5
desc: It was made only for Hungarian S.W.I.N.E., starting with this version you don't need the CD to run it.
author: Stormregion

title: S.W.I.N.E. 1.4
desc: The CD is required to run the game! List of fixes: - many sound card related bugs have been fixed. - A player being eliminated sometimes caused the game to crash - fixed. - Improved Internet network management, so the program is less sensitive to network interruptions and data loss. - Another 5 multiplayer courses! - Turbo equipment item was not working properly - fixed.
author: Stormregion

title: S.W.I.N.E. 1.3
desc: The very first version of S.W.I.N.E.! CD is required to run!
author: Stormregion
